Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class NormalDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.NormalDepot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Depot
public class NormalDepot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Depot
This class represents the default type of depot of Maestri del Rinascimento board game. It allows the player to stock a limited number of a type of resources.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int occ
    The number of resources stocked in the depot.
    private int size
    The maximum number of resources that can be stocked into the depot.
    private ResourceType type
    The type of ResourceType stocked in the depot.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    NormalDepot​(int size)
    Constructs an empty normal depot of the given size.
    NormalDepot​(int occ, ResourceType type, int size)
    Construct a normal depot from the given occurrences, resource type and size.
